title: About Our Company
name: AgentFlow AI solutions
content:
We are a leading AI solutions provider based in Germany, specializing in production-ready machine learning systems. Founded in 2019, we've helped 50+ companies across automotive, manufacturing, e-commerce, and finance sectors implement AI at scale.

Our Expertise:
- Computer Vision (quality control, object detection)
- Natural Language Processing (chatbots, document analysis)
- Predictive Analytics (maintenance, demand forecasting)
- Recommendation Systems
- MLOps & Model Deployment

Team: 25 ML engineers, 5 data scientists
Certifications: ISO 27001, SOC 2 Type II
Clients: BMW suppliers, major e-commerce platforms, fintech companies

Why Choose Us:
1. Production-first approach - we don't do proofs of concept, we build systems
2. Fast deployment - average 6-8 weeks from contract to production
3. German data privacy - all data stays in EU, GDPR compliant
4. Post-deployment support - 24/7 monitoring and retraining
5. Transparent pricing - no hidden costs

title: Our Development Process
content:
We follow a structured 4-phase approach:

Phase 1: Discovery (1-2 weeks)
- Requirements gathering
- Data assessment
- Feasibility analysis
- Cost estimation
- Proof of value on sample data

Phase 2: Development (3-4 weeks)
- Data pipeline setup
- Model training and optimization
- Integration with existing systems
- Security and compliance review

Phase 3: Deployment (1-2 weeks)
- Staged rollout
- Load testing
- User training
- Documentation

Phase 4: Optimization (ongoing)
- Performance monitoring
- Model retraining
- Feature updates
- Monthly review meetings

All projects include:
- Dedicated ML engineer
- Project manager
- Weekly status updates
- Source code delivery
- 90-day warranty
